contextId.occurrenceNote: Some versions add "when he was at Hebron" and others do not. You may want to add the phrase if it is present in your national version. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-textvariants]])
Some versions translate this as "Elhanan son of Jair the Bethlehemite killed the brother of Goliath the Gittite."  (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-textvariants]])
contextId.glQuote: Elhanan son of Jair the Bethlehemite killed Goliath the Gittite
